item.title: Announcing Early Release
item.description:
Learn the most critical features of Docker, how build reliable container images, and how to ship them in production.

“Docker is a good approach to solving some real-world organizational problems and helping enable companies to ship better software faster”

“Docker: Up and Running” is now available in early release and can be downloaded from O’Reilly Media in many popular ebook formats.

The Final Book Ships June 25, 2015

Stay tuned for updates.

item.title: Free Preview
item.description:
The first three chapters of the book are now available for free from New Relic who have kindly sponsored this preview release.

The authors have been running Docker in production for a year and a half and can now pass on some of that valuable experience to you.

In these chapters you’ll learn a little about Docker’s history, what a container is and is not, how Docker is different from other solutions, and why it might be a good fit for you. By the time you’re finished with the free preview, you’ll have Docker installed and running on your development system.

“Docker is the lingua franca between clouds”

The Final Book Ships June 25, 2015
